Issue.creator: c0rwin
Issue.summary: Move rscc resource constants declarations from aclmgmt
Issue.description: RSCC constants API constants names are declared within {{aclmgmt}} package, which might potential bring the dependency cycle if anyone would try to refer those constant from other packages which for example depends on {{peer}} package. I'd suggest to refactor and extract those constant into separate package to mitigate the risk on dependency cycle creation.
